Description:
Inspired Design, Impressive Luxury
Near new and ready to move in, this luxury family residence offers modern design with a high level finish and spectacular proportions with accommodating yard.
Wonderful first impression upon entry with a spacious foyer, great size study, wide entrance hall leading to the sensational living and dining areas either side of a premium gourmet kitchen boasting stone benches with waterfall edge, stainless appliances, undermount sink, wide fridge/freezer space, butler's pantry and a stunning timber feature bulk head above the island bench. The living spaces extend out to a cosy outdoor al fresco and landscaped private garden.
Generous proportions continue upstairs through the lavish main bedroom with walk in robe and stunning ensuite, a balcony, guest/4th bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe, two further bedrooms with built in robes, a stylish designer bathroom and comfortable retreat area.
This grand family home is located just 5 minutes walk to Craigieburn village shops, cafes and childcare. Highlands Shopping Centre and Mount Ridley College are only short drive away..
Features include, heating and cooling, stainless steel appliances, remote double garage with gas available for second kitchen, built in TV unit, ducted vacuum, video intercom, dishwasher, alarm system butlers pantry and so much more to mention. Dont miss out!
Insights: 4 Bilby Street, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Immaculate Investment Property
The Facts >
Guaranteed Rent - $345 p.w
Yield* - 4.73% p.a
Land Size - 168sqm
Council Rates - $1,586 p.a
Water Rates - $712.53 p.a
Capital Growth - 6.62% p.a
Body Corporate - $1,100 p.a
Primary School - Aitken Creek Primary School
Secondary School - Mount Ridley P-12 College
Set within a quiet family neighbourhood, this three bedroom / three bathroom townhouse presents a superb investment opportunity, offering LongView Guaranteed Rent of $345 per week. Having achieved achieved historical capital growth of 6.62% p.a, the excellent location within walking distance of leafy parklands, local schools, shopping and public transport the growth is set to continue.
An expansive open plan living and dining room is flooded with abundant natural light and flows directly out to a spacious north facing courtyard garden, ideal for year-round entertaining.
The home's airy contemporary kitchen comprises abundant sleek cabinetry, stainless steel appliances with a gas cooktop, generous preparation spaces and a breakfast bar.
Upstairs, three spacious carpet bedrooms are each equipped with built-in wardrobes, with the master bedroom boasting a walk-in wardrobe, an ensuite with double shower and vanity, and opening out directly onto a spacious private balcony via floor-to-ceiling glass sliding doors. A central bathroom with separate w/c is complemented by a downstairs powder room and a spacious full laundry.
With low maintenance landscaped gardens, tiled flooring, roller blinds, ducted heating and air conditioning throughout, the home also offers a double lockup garage set on an aggregate driveway.
Situated within easy walking distance of Aitken Creek Primary School and Centennial Park Drive Reserve, the home is also set just moments from buses, local Craigieburn Central shopping, Highlands Lake Playground and Mount Ridley P-12 College.
Insights: 3A Kirkstead Grove, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Stunning Renovation in Prized Location (659m2 approximately)
Be enticed by this stunning family home, beautifully renovated to reflect style and comfort. Set out on a spacious 659m2 approximately in close proximity to Hume Highway, transportation, shops and local schools, this home will be sure to please the lucky buyer.
Walk in and be invited by the spacious lounge creating a sense of intimacy with its open fireplace, plantation shutters and a bright garden prospective. With a separate family/ meals area and renovated kitchen complete with stone bench-tops and Stainless Steel Smeg appliances this will be sure to bring out the Master Chef in you. Including 3 bedrooms Walk In Robe & renovated Ensuite to main, renovated main bathroom and laundry with ample cupboard space and stone benches in all wet areas.
Step outside and be pleased with its pergola area and outdoor spa, impressive size low maintenance rear yard for the kids to play till their hearts content and if that's not enough cross the road to the park and let them be entertained by the big open space and play equipment. Additional features include, double garage with drive thru access, evaporative cooling, gas ducted heating, polished floorboards, cathedral ceiling, ducted vacuum and much more.
Insights: 26 Northern Crescent, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
BRAND NEW HOME - Affordable first home buyer or investment opportunity!!!
The moment you step inside this BRAND NEW home you will be impressed with the style and comfort this family home offers. This is perfect opportunity for a first home buyers or inves-tors to secure this home.
The free flowing interior boasts luxury of open plan living with 4 bedrooms, a large Master Bedroom with walk in robes and spectacular sized shower in ensuite, modern central bathroom Well appointed kitchen with 40mm stone bench top, 900mm appliances and Dishwasher. Comfortable living is what you will experience as its contemporary design com-plemented with ducted heating and evaporative cooling, a full sized laundry and remote controlled double garage with internal access.
This amazing house is located close to Highlands shopping centre, Highlands Hotel, Hume Anglican Grammar School, Trillium central park, bus stop, a short walk to Newbury Primary School, Child Care facilities, Parklands, cafes and service station. Easy com-mute to Melbourne CBD and freeway.
This is your chance to invest in a new lifestyle or claim first home buyer's grant, it's all brand new!!!!
Call Gordon Garg on 0433 897 397 today to book your inspection!

Description:
Brand New 4 Bedroom Home !!!
This brand new well presented home is sure to impress the most astute of buyers from owner occupiers to investors alike. The home offers spacious four bedrooms; the master bedroom has the luxury of a full ensuite and walk-in robe, while the three remaining bedrooms are fitted with built-in robes and are serviced by the central bathroom. Into the heart of the home, you'll find the naturally light filled open plan kitchen and meals area and a separate lounge/rumpus. The kitchen provides stone bench top, quality s/s appliances and large pantry, ducted heating, evap cooling and more. Conveniently located within walking distance to public transport, Child care facilities, Newbury Primary School, Hockey Ground, Parklands. Inspect this beautifully appointed home with confidence and be quick, for homes like these certainly don't last!
Call Gordon Garg on 0433 897 397 to book your inspection!!

Description:
Price reduced !!!!! Prestigious Townhouse Living At Its Best !!!
This beautiful and well-presented townhouse is across the road to the highlands shopping centre with everything at your door step. Boasting a versatile floor plan and offering a large family living area which is intelligently positioned to incorporate the meals and kitchen area leading to two separate balconies.
Features good sized bedrooms with built in robes, kitchen includes marble quantum quartz bench tops with 40mm edging and glass splash back, plus BLANCO stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher. There are timber floors and the wet rooms are fully tiled. Upstairs, at the rear is a brilliant outdoor entertaining area, ideal for BBQs and relaxing.
At the front there is another balcony which gives scenic views of the massive park, and nature reserve. Other extras include: Panel Lift garage remote control door, 5 star hot water system, split system heating and cooling, LED downlights, just to name a few.. Also within close proximity to highlands hotel, medical centre, Gym, local schools including Hume Anglican Grammar, childcare facilities, bus stop, parklands and more...
Call Shaun Chaudhry on 0421 429 408 now to arrange your inspection, and be pleasantly surprised!

Description:
BEST FAMILY HOME
A beautiful Brand New 4 Bedroom house in the heart of Craigieburn is under construction. Location doesn't get any better than this, with schools, Highlands Shopping Centre, parks and public transport just a short stroll away. Set in a beautiful street with the friendliest of neighbours is this much loved and cared for home.
With 4 generous sized bedrooms (master with full ensuite and WIR and remaining 3 bedrooms with BIR's). When it comes to space it caters to all large and growing families with an open plan living area with a great sized kitchen with ample cupboard space and stainless-steel appliances.
An abundance of light, luxury and living space defines this exceptional family home situated in a privileged position, only minutes from Craigieburn Central and beautiful parklands.
This home is designed to accommodate both growing family and first home buyers
Features:
Downlights in the living area
Evaporative Cooling
Ducted Heating
40mm stone bench top in kitchen
900 stainless steel appliances
Front yard landscaping from builders range
Coloured concrete driveway
Photos For Illustrative Purposes Only
More New Homes and House & Land Packages are available in Wollert, Craigieburn, Mickleham, Mernda and Kalkallo.
CALL NOW TO INSPECT!
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers -
http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Move In Or Rent Out..
Set in the beautiful Highlands estate amongst quality homes and Craigieburn's amenities makes this home very ideally located. Feature packed and move in ready this home has everything that a first home buyer, investor and or down-sizer could want. Comprising with a great size master bedroom completed with walk in robe and ensuite, fully equipped kitchen featuring Caesar stone bench tops, walk in pantry and stainless-steel appliances including dishwasher, adjoining meals and family room, main bathroom and much more. With additional features including ducted heating, split system cooling, single lock up garage with remote control internal and external access, low maintenance front and back gardens to highlight just a few. Close by to schools, public transport, parklands and walking trails, the Stockland shopping Centre and much more. An Inspection Is A Must, Call Now Before You Miss Out..

Description:
Space, Style & Sophistication In Court Location!! (670m2 approximately)
Presented with pride, this beautifully crafted home has been built to the highest of standards making it arguably one of the best homes that Craigieburn has on offer. Entertain the masses and feel right at home with a flexible floor plan and glowing interior which comprises of 4 generous size bedrooms, lavish ensuite with double vanity & WIR to main, sparkling central bathroom, striking kitchen with stainless steel appliances, walk in pantry and ample cupboard space, adjoining meals and huge family area that flows seamlessly through to the undercover alfresco entertaining area perfect for all occasions. Complete with high ceilings, large size formal lounge, formal dining or home office, ducted heating and evaporative cooling, alarm system, garden shed or work shop, double remote garage, side drive perfect for the boat or caravan, landscaped manicured gardens & much more. All this set on a magnificent parcel of land of 670m2 (Approximately). One of Craigieburn's most illustrious locations, surrounded by, parklands, shops, schools and much more. Inspection is a must!!!!!!

Description:
Ticks All The Boxes....
Nestled in the best pocket of Craigieburn, in a friendly quite family neighbourhood, within short distance to Schools, Parks, Public Transport and Shopping Centres.
This Charming townhouse has got everything to offer, including an open plan first floor comprising of a study room, a separate toilet with a basin, a fully equipped kitchen with ample cupboard space, a generous size family room and dining area with access to a generous size backyard.
The second floor has three generous size bedrooms, master with full en-suite and WIR, the other two with built in robes and a central modern bathroom.
Additional features include: High ceilings, ducted heating, a split system, floor board ground floor, 900mm stainless steel appliances, down-lights, furnished windows, security system and intercom system.
Whether you're buying to live in or for an investment, this great opportunity is one not to be missed..inspection is a must!

Description:
Sizable Living, Desirable Location on 664m2!
Without question one of Craigieburn's finest homes, designed & built by Porter Davis, be amazed by this wonderful family home which welcomes you with its touch of style, character & class & is ideal for the astute purchaser who loves to entertain the masses.
Nestled in an elite location on a whisper quiet tree-lined setting, within walking distance to the beautiful Thorngrove Park, schools, shops, bus stop & spread out on a fantastic wide allotment of approx 664m2, this sensational home will no doubt be the envy of all family & friends forever!
Comprising of 4 large bedrooms, master with walk-in-robe, ensuite with direct access to a deck, 3 living areas & roomy study. Continue through to the heart of the home & meet the hostess stone-top kitchen, fully equipped with 900mm stainless steel appliances, deep pantry & ample bench space adjoining a large meals & family zone where everyday relaxing is accompanied by views of a spacious entertaining area where hosting large-scale parties will be a breeze.
Step outside, fire up the BBQ on your decked alfresco & be amazed by the generous proportions that the private paradise provides which effortlessly meets up with the home to provide the ultimate indoor/outdoor integration. Truly the perfect haven for the all seasons entertainer & for kids to run around in complete privacy.
Extras include high ceilings, double remote garage, ample off-street parking, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, decked alfresco with fan & enclosable Bella-vista blinds, a beautiful array of fruit trees, lush emerald green grass & much much more!
Perched up high with its commanding street presence & located to absolute perfection are words rarely strung together in a sentence about a home, but this property is all that & more!
Insights: 9 Northcroft Street, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
700M2 WITH SIDE ACCESS AND A STANDOUT LOCATION
This four bedroom beauty on a block of 700sqm (approx.) is designed to provide a relaxed haven for the families. Located in a sought out established neighbourhood within moments from transport, schools and shops, it represents an exceptional opportunity.
An ideal mix for entertaining and everyday living, Its highly accommodating floorplan with light filled interiors and multiple living areas that are kept comfortable throughout the year by ducted heating and split systems (x3) cooling. Featuring a separate family room, and spacious lounge the homes design caters perfectly for the kids and adults.
A well-appointed kitchen boasting excellent storage and island stone top benches spills onto dining area and opens to a spacious pergola and garden where youll also discover maturing tree line fence and storage shed.
Four well-proportioned bedrooms with master featuring the ensuite and two bedrooms have their own built-in robes and are serviced by a bright updated bathroom and separate toilet.
Adding to the appeal a spacious backyard with side access wide enough for boats, caravan or other toys, double lock up garage with drive through access, this home offers easy access to the Craigieburn station, Hume Freeway, Craigieburn central, Highlands shopping centre, Craigieburn Plaza, excellent schools including Craigieburn Primary, Mother Teresa Catholic Primary, Hume Anglican Grammar to name a fewcome have a look
Insights: 11 Hamilton Hume Parade, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Sensational New Style with Quality & Finesse!
Meticulously detailed & beautifully appointed, this just-completed 3 bedroom home presents a
brilliant new lifestyle opportunity with its intelligent single-level floorplan & first-class features throughout - all perfectly positioned in one of Craigieburn's favourite new neighbourhoods.
Vogue interior showcases a wide central hallway, master bedroom with large walk-in robe & deluxe ensuite (double vanity & double shower), 2 additional bedrooms (both with built-in robes) & equally-stylish main bathroom. Add to this a family-sized laundry with ample storage cupboards, gourmet kitchen with tiled splashbacks, breakfast bar & high-end Technika appliances, as well as a wonderfully spacious open-plan living/dining area leading out to a back garden.
What really sets this home apart is its long list of premium inclusions such as stone benchtops throughout (including the laundry), soft-close cabinetry with ultra-glaze finishes throughout, high ceilings with LED downlights throughout, plus ducted heating & evaporative cooling, video intercom, internally-accessed garage (remote-control) & additional driveway parking.
Close proximity to Craigieburn's growing array of primary & secondary schools, popular parks & shopping centres (via Grand Boulevard) along with easy access to Mickleham Road & the
Hume Freeway.
Insights: 13 Angophora Crescent, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.
